plants.name: Dieffenbachia
plants.about: It is a tropical species that grows quickly and is easy to handle.
plants.water_tips: Keep the soil always moist without soaking. Water twice a week.

plants.name: Zamioculca
plants.about: Despite blooming in spring, it looks beautiful and green all year round.
plants.water_tips: Use pots with holes and stones on the bottom to facilitate drainage. Water once a day.

plants.name: Peperomia
plants.about: It adapts so much to the sun and shade, but prefers to stay in a cool corner, without direct sun.
plants.water_tips: On the hottest days, sprinkle water on the leaves. Water 3 times a week.

plants.name: Philodendron
plants.about: Medium sized that adapts to different regions, as well as being very easy to cultivate. It conquers more and more people.
plants.water_tips: Keep the soil always moist without soaking. Water twice a week.

plants.name: Dracaena
plants.about: The aroma reduces anxiety levels and its smell helps with sleep quality and productivity during the day.
plants.water_tips: Water the soil around it. Water it once a day.

plants.name: Yucca
plants.about: They are recommended because they are easy to maintain and care for. You put them in small pots, or even in cups.
plants.water_tips: Thanks to the water reserve of these greenbacks, it is always best to water a little. Water once a week.

plants.name: Frut√≠feras
plants.about: They require a few hours of sunshine a day, so keep them close to windows.
plants.water_tips: Always water the soil and not the leaves. Water 3 times a week

plants.name: Orchids
plants.about: Brings a sense of tranquility and peace to the environment. Requires little maintenance and is great for those with little space.
plants.water_tips: Water moderately. Require 4 times a week.

plants.name: Violet
plants.about: With delicate flowers. They are great suggestions for decorating the bathroom.
plants.water_tips: No watering the flowers and leaves. Water the soil twice a week.

plants.name: Hydrangea
plants.about: The hydrangea is a rustic plant and adapts to different types of soils.
plants.water_tips: Keep the soil always moist without soaking. Water once a day.
